Package controller

Class MainFormController

java.lang.Object
controller.MainFormController
public class MainFormController extends Object
Controls the behavior of the mainForm.fxml scene. Displays the custTable and apptTable in a tab pane with buttons for add, update, delete, reports, and exit lambda expression used here for the sake of abstraction and cleaner code to SetStageInterface basicStage variable is defined here for use in other methods to change scenes.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the apptTable and custTable to accept data and populates them with data from database

    • onAddCust

      public void onAddCust(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Changes scene to the addUpdateCustomer form to allow creation of a new Customer basicStage.setStage() as defined in lambda expression above used here to change scenes
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the action event
      Throws:
      IOException - Catches any exceptions thrown during data input / output

    • onUpdateCust

      public void onUpdateCust(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Determines if a Customer is selected and, if so, changes scene to addUpdateCustomer.fxml. If no Customer selected, an error message appears instructing user to select a Customer basicStage.setStage() as defined in lambda expression above used here to change scenes
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the action event
      Throws:
      IOException - Catches any exceptions thrown during data input / output

    • onDeleteCust

      public void onDeleteCust()
      Deletes the selected customer from the database. Shows alert to allow user to verify intention to delete. If no Customer is selected, an error message appears telling user to select a customer

    • onAddAppt

      public void onAddAppt(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Changes scene to the addUpdateAppt form to allow creation of a new Appt basicStage.setStage() as defined in lambda expression above used here to change scenes
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the action event
      Throws:
      IOException - Catches any exceptions thrown during data input / output

    • onUpdateAppt

      public void onUpdateAppt(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Changes scene to the addUpdateAppt form to allow updating of an existing Appt. If no Appt is selected, error message appears instructing user to select an Appt basicStage.setStage() as defined in lambda expression above used here to change scenes
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the action event
      Throws:
      IOException - Catches any exceptions thrown during data input / output

    • onDeleteAppt

      public void onDeleteAppt()
      Deletes the selected Appt from the database. Shows alert to allow user to verify intention to delete. If no Appt is selected, an error message appears telling user to select an Appt

    • onAllApptView

      public void onAllApptView()
      Filters the apptTable appointments to show all appointments

    • onWeekApptView

      public void onWeekApptView()
      Filters the apptTable appointments to show only appointments within the current week.

    • onMonthApptView

      public void onMonthApptView()
      Filters the apptTable appointments to show only appointments within the current month.

    • isApptSelected

      public boolean isApptSelected()
      Determines if an Appt is selected when either the update or delete buttons are clicked
      Returns:
      true if an Appt is selected, otherwise return false

    • isCustSelected

      public boolean isCustSelected()
      Determines if a Customer is selected when either the update or delete buttons are clicked
      Returns:
      true if a Customer is selected, otherwise return false
